resources.string: by Sign up you are agree with our
Discover the full functionality with a VIP subscription:

Registration of your profile with a spectacular VIP sign in search results, lists of friends, guests and in your profile.

Filter incoming messages: from VIP users, questionnaires with photos, selection by country of residence and age!

Automatic raising of your profile to the first place of search results by country and city every two days!

VIP-search by interests, character, preferences, physique, financial status and other important parameters!

Unlimited number of ratings + 5, likes without borders, invisibility, the ability to write to everyone without restrictions.
Linking a mobile number and mail to the profile
Lure of PIN-codes of payment cards, requests to replenish the account
Requests to send SMS to short numbers

If your password is a combination of numbers (1234, 3333, 1122…), date of birth (1985, 01041988, 2204…), your phone number, or your password repeats your nickname, then consider that your profile has already been stolen! A strong password must be at least 6 characters long and contain both letters and numbers. Example: 3u4YY34, gh37cdmA, 38927kLh, 2104oLeg77 Set up your password recovery mode. Menu - Settings - Password recovery: - Password recovery by phone number. Convenient way. When recovering your password, you must enter your mobile number in international format and the year of birth (not the date). The change code will be sent to your mobile. - Password recovery via email. An easy way with an added safety factor. The recovery code will be sent to your mail, the password for which only you know. - Password recovery on the security question on the phone. If someone else has access to your mobile except you, we recommend using SMS recovery using a security question. Without answering the question, the password change code will not be sent. At least one of the recovery methods must be enabled. To avoid possible difficulties in further changing / recovering the password of the profile, we recommend that you do not ignore the password recovery item by e-mail. If your mobile number, which you used for activation, has changed, link the new number to the questionnaire. You can always change your password in your profile settings. None of the users of the application can see your phone number and email.
After confirmation of the request for deletion Your profile will be instantly deleted from Googoosha Apps

Can users write messages to you without photos\n(besides Your friends and VIP)
For the first time with us? Where to start?
There are few guests, no one writes to you, you are bored, what to do?
How long is correspondence and comments stored?

Declare yourself!
Fill out your questionnaire as soon as possible, tell us about yourself, your plans and interests. My profile - edit, save the changes. Do not forget to fill out a detailed questionnaire (type, dating and other data). Add a highlight to your profile, set your Status. My questionnaire - Set the status. According to the established statuses, it is easy to determine what kind of mood and emotional state a person is in. Do not hide your emotions, especially if they are positive!
Be sure to add your Personal photo. My profile - My photos
 - Add a photo. Other visitors want to see who they are communicating with.
Choose your favorite picture and upload it to your album. My profile -My photo albums - Add an album.
The best way to become one of your own among your own is to be active! Communicate with other people, do not hesitate, write personal messages, leave

1. If you don't have any personal photos, be sure to add them. Other visitors want to see who they are communicating with.
2. Fill out your questionnaire as much as possible, tell us about yourself, your plans and interests. Do not forget to fill in the type, dating goals and sexual questionnaire. Be as honest as possible when filling out. Do not invent unreal images for yourself in order to surprise everyone.
3. In order to attract visitors to your profile, we strongly recommend using such services as: Questionnaire of the day, Raise the questionnaire (to the firstplace in the search results), Write to me, Sympathy.
4. Do not hesitate to write to other users, leave comments on their photos, vote for the photo! Become special - connect VIP status!
We can say with full confidence that after all this you will attract a lot of attention to yourself and there will definitely be no time to be bored!

Correspondence is stored for at least 1 year, and comments are without time limit.\nBut everything will be lost if the questionnaire is deleted by you yourself, or because of your absence from the site for more 1 year, or blocked by a Moderator for violating the Rules of the application and User Agreement.

All messages of the application are sent instantly after you have confirmed the sending and have seen your text on the correspondence screen.\nPlease note that the notification label (background) is stored for three weeks.\nIf the message remains unread during this time, the inscription "not read" will disappear, the background will become the same, but the message itself will remain in the correspondence.

Spam is a mass malicious mailing of information (messages) to persons who have not expressed a desire to receive it.\nSpam includes commercial, political advertising, advertising Internet resources; messages in which you are asked to send SMS to a short number or other methods, the purpose of which is to lure your money; letters in which you are asked to inform your personal data, phone numbers, passwords, etc.\nIf you receive such information, it is enough to add the sender's questionnaire to ignore, and also click "Complain" in this questionnaire and select the reason complaints. After that, the questionnaire will be submitted to the application Moderators for mandatory verification.
Why replenish the balance of the questionnaire?
How much does one coin cost?

With a positive balance of coins, you have access to numerous additional services that are designed to make your stay in the application more interesting and productive!\nHaving replenished the balance, you will be able to: acquire VIP status, give gifts, raise your profile in search results, post your profile in the "Profile of the Day", etc.\nReplenishment of the balance is not a mandatory requirement. You can chat, leave comments, post photos absolutely for free, but we sincerely recommend that you try our additional services, in order to make your pastime in the application even more comfortable.

The price of one coin depends on the method of replenishment of the balance and the amount of the order (if you replenish the questionnaire account by sending SMS from a mobile phone).
When depositing via SMS, pay attention to the fact that the more expensive the short number, the more profitable it is to buy coins!
The most profitable ways to replenish the balance of coins are deposits with Visa or MasterCard bank cards and payment systems WebMoney.
If you are not from Russia, the amount in your local currency will be debited from the card at the rate of your bank.

Open the menu, your Profile Balance is displayed next to your name/nickname. Click the Top Up button.
Next, select the payment method (by bank card or by SMS). If you have chosen to top up your balance via SMS, select the short number to which you will send SMS.
The cost of sending SMS to a short number and the number of coins received at the same time are indicated in the table.
Please note that the more expensive the short number, the more profitable the replenishment!
To top up your profile balance, send an SMS from your mobile phone with text in Latin letters: tb
#USER_ID#
After sending the message, your coin balance on the site will be replenished automatically.

Russian operators:
MTS, Beeline, Megafon, Smarts, Tele2, Utel.
Payment procedure:
Specify the payment amount (in rubles),
Specify the phone number from which the payment will be made,
Confirm the payment by answering the incoming SMS. To pay the bill you have 20 minutes.
Restrictions of mobile operators:
Beeline
The service is available to subscribers of tariff plans of any payment system, except for the tariff line: "Simple logic", "Correct", subscribers who have "Unlimited inside" services connected networks" or "Crazy Days". Payment is possible only from a special advance account.
The minimum payment amount is 30 rubles Payments per day (amount/quantity) - 30,000 rubles / 10.
The minimum balance on the account after purchase is 50 rubles.

Topping up your account with your Visa or MasterCard plastic card is the most profitable payment method.
Our application is connected to Internet acquiring, and you can purchase coins with a bank card Visa, MasterCard, Maestro and the WORLD. After selecting the required number of coins a secure window will open with the payment page of the processing center CloudPayments, where you need to enter your bank card details. For additional authentication of the cardholder, the 3D Secure protocol is used. If Your Bank supports this technology, you will be redirected to its server for additional identification. For information about the rules and methods of additional identification, check with the Bank that issued you a bank card.
Security guarantees
Cloud Payments Processing Center protects and processes data your bank card according to the PCI DSS 3.2 security standard. Transfer of information to the payment gateway.
